My Creative Process

The process I use when working on a new project.

1

Identify the project requirments

'What does the client want? What doesn't the client want? What does the project NEED to do? What is the expected end result and where does it come from?'

2

Design

Create a system design based on the requirements.

3

Implementation

Once system design documents are finalized, start coding.

4

Testing

Once the code has been developed, its tested against the project requirements to the clients satisfaction.

5

Deployment

When the code has passed all client requirements, it's deployed/delivered to them for their use.
